transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan haan aaya hu main join kare.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai join kariye.
Customer: Aapne link isme diya hai kya WhatsApp pe send kiya hai kya?
Executive: Nahi WhatsApp pe send nahi kiya main bhej deta hu abhi ek minute.
Executive: Main abhi sir apni taraf se call karta hu aapko recording line pe theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan kariye aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about the link, asking if it was sent via WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the link was not sent via WhatsApp and offered to send it.

- Executive offered to call the customer back on a recorded line.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will send the link and call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

link, whatsapp, recording
